short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll tabs at the same time! Using this extension, you can view two tabs in different languages at the same time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
---------- Release Notes ----------
1.0.3 - Fixed a bug that does not work in windows OS full screen mode.
1.0.4 - "Sync Url" option added.
If you check this option, the URL of one tab will change when the URL of another tab changes.
